body:
The stack trace for this one is:

```
0   libwebcore_shared.dylib       	0x000000010c4cdf68 blink::BindingSecurity::shouldAllowAccessTo(v8::Isolate*, v8::Local<v8::Context>, v8::Local<v8::Context>, blink::SecurityReportingOption) + 200

18  libv8.dylib                   	0x0000000106cb0570 0x10695d000 + 3487088

```

This looks to be fixed in Chrome 54, I can't reproduce this on the #7909 branch.
